articleTitle: Trauer um Extremsportler: Red-Bull-Athlet tödlich verunglückt
articleTitleTranslated: Mourning for extreme athletes: Red Bull athlete had a fatal accident
articleContent: Der Franzose und "Jetman" Vincent Reffet starb beim Training in Dubai.  Er wurde 36 Jahre alt.
articleContentTranslated: The Frenchman and "Jetman" Vincent Reffet died while training in Dubai. He was 36 years old.
